thread.title: Bruce Willis Downsizes in Manhattan

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Bruce Willis Downsizes in Manhattan
text:
MANSION Bruce Willis Downsizes in Manhattan Weeks after finding a buyer for their sprawling Central Park West apartment, actor Bruce Willis and his wife Emma are downsizing to a smaller Manhattan home.
Tokyo’s Growing Yen for High-Rise Apartments An uptick in demand for high-rise luxury apartments in Japan’s capital city is driven, in part, by younger couples, tech entrepreneurs and foreign buyers want more upscale amenities.
